title: Frederick Law Olmsted National Historic Site: Deaf / Hearing Loss
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Deaf / Hearing Loss              Deaf / Hearing Loss       A variety of brochures and other printed information is available that describe the site. All exhibits are accessible including our new site video that has open captioning. A script of the Historic Design Office tour is available or one can contact the Massachusetts Council for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing http://www.mass.gov/eohhs/gov/departments/mcdhh/programs who are able to recommend ASL Interpretive services.
